channel.title: Help!
channel.description: ok i need help to find a good private server and a client and how to do it public whitout using hamatchi plz help me like show me some good links or something

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @sjustin1996 sjustin1996
item.description:
@sjustin1996 wrote:

Use the search function while you’re in “Server Downloads” section, and to get it online:

  1. Open cmd.exe (start -> run -> cmd.exe)
  2. Type “ipconfig”
  3. Scroll up until you find the IP (it’s something like 192.168.1.1 and under/above should be one with the end number changed, in example, 192.168.1.2)
  4. Once you have the IP, copy it down somewhere, and then type the other one (the original one, usually with 1 or 255 on the end, not the 192.168.1.2 or something)
  5. Type that IP into your browser.
  6. Try combinations of: Pass, password, admin, and administrator, or if you know your login/pass use it.
  7. Go to Port Forwarding section.
  8. Portforward the other IP (192.168.1.2 or whatever it is) to - Start: 43594 and End: 43594, or if yours only gives one option, just put 43594.
  9. Go to no-ip.com and make an account.
  10. Manage hosts
  11. Add a host, don’t change anything but the drop-down menu and the custom IP that’s to the left of it.

And then you can make clients go to your no-ip address, which you should replace your hamachi address with, and then enjoy your server!

Read full topic
